info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 12:24AM EDT until August 13 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LANCASTER COUNTY... At 1224 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Birdsboro to New Morgan to Terre Hill, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Holland, Reamstown, Adamstown, Terre Hill, Churchtown, Bareville, Bowmansville, Fivepointville, Blue Ball, Goodville and White Horse. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 286 to 295. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
